Driving Responsible Innovation in Space

The Space Impact Forum is a global platform dedicated to advancing sustainable practices in the space sector. Through panel discussions, policy roundtables, and hands-on labs, participants explore the opportunities and challenges of space sustainability, from debris mitigation to equitable access to orbital resources.

By fostering collaboration between industry, government, and civil society, the forum empowers attendees to translate knowledge into actionable strategies that support ethical growth and long-term space stewardship.

3
Days
5
Impact Labs

Global Collaboration

Engage with experts and innovators from over 30 countries

Innovation in Space

Discover the latest technologies and approaches that are shaping sustainable space operations.

Expert Insights

Learn from global leaders, entrepreneurs, and policy experts driving change in space sustainability.

Hands-on Labs

Participate in interactive workshops to develop practical solutions for responsible space operations.

Global Networking

Build meaningful connections with space professionals, startups, and policy makers worldwide.

Policy & Strategy

Gain insights into international frameworks, sustainability policies, and strategic approaches for space governance.

Future-Oriented

Explore the long-term impacts of today’s decisions on the future of space exploration and resource management.

Join the Movement for Sustainable Space

Be part of a global initiative that drives impact, collaboration, and responsible growth in the space sector.
